## AGlBinder class

Data binder for webgl graphics components.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare abstract class AGlBinder<TComponentRenderer extends TGlBasicComponentRenderer, TConnector> implements IGlBinder<TComponentRenderer, TConnector>
```
